comment: кричат радикалы, если прилетеи с радикалами или одни

languages.text: "Мы прибыли следом за тобой, Дитя, ведомые Атласом. Встань подле нас! Дом Орселлио не променяет наследие Тисифоны на ложные идеалы слепцов!"

traits.locale_text: [драфт] Кассия, дитя, прячься за нас! Наследие великой Тисифоны должно принадлежать лишь вернейшим ее последователям!

languages.text: "We followed the Atlas's call in your wake, Child. Stand with us! House Orsellio will not trade Tisiphone's legacy for the false ideals of blind fools!"
languages.original_text: "Мы прибыли следом за тобой, Дитя, ведомые Атласом. Встань подле нас! Дом Орселлио не променяет наследие Тисифоны на ложные идеалы слепцов!"

traits.locale_text: "We followed the Atlas's call in your wake, Child. Stand with us! House Orsellio will not trade Tisiphone's legacy for the false ideals of blind fools!"
"We followed the Atlas's call in your wake, Child. Stand with us! House Orsellio will not trade Tisiphone's legacy for the false ideals of blind fools!"
"We followed the Atlas's call in your wake, Child. Stand with us! House Orsellio will not trade Tisiphone's legacy for the false ideals of blind fools!"
"We followed the Atlas's call in your wake, Child. Stand with us! House Orsellio will not trade Tisiphone's legacy for the false ideals of blind fools!"
"We followed the Atlas's call in your wake, Child. Stand with us! House Orsellio will not trade Tisiphone's legacy for the false ideals of blind fools!"

languages.text: « Nous avons suivi l'appel de l'Atlas jusqu'à vous, Enfant. Joignez-vous à nous ! La maison Orsellio ne sacrifiera jamais l'héritage de Tisiphone au nom des idéaux iniques de quelques imbéciles égarés ! »
languages.original_text: "We followed the Atlas's call in your wake, Child. Stand with us! House Orsellio will not trade Tisiphone's legacy for the false ideals of blind fools!"

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons suivi l'appel de l'Atlas jusqu'à vous, enfant. Joignez-vous à nous ! La maison Orsellio ne sacrifiera jamais l'héritage de Tisiphone au nom des idéaux iniques de quelques imbéciles égarés ! »

languages.text: 「我々はアトラスの呼びかけに従った。我々と共に立て！オーセリオ家は、ティシフォンの遺産を、盲目の愚か者の偽りの理想と引き換えにはしない！」
languages.original_text: "We followed the Atlas's call in your wake, Child. Stand with us! House Orsellio will not trade Tisiphone's legacy for the false ideals of blind fools!"

traits.locale_text: 「我々はアトラスの呼びかけに従った。我々と共に立て！オーセリオ家は、ティシフォンの遺産を、盲目の愚か者の偽りの理想と引き換えにはしない！」

languages.text: “我们跟着圣仪的召唤，随您一路来到了这里，圣子！快来我们这边吧！奥赛罗家族绝不该为了愚不可及的理想，而放弃提西福涅的遗产！”
languages.original_text: "We followed the Atlas's call in your wake, Child. Stand with us! House Orsellio will not trade Tisiphone's legacy for the false ideals of blind fools!"

traits.locale_text: “我们跟着圣仪的召唤，随您一路来到了这里，圣子！快来我们这边吧！奥塞罗家族绝不该为了愚不可及的理想，而放弃提西福涅的遗产！”

languages.text: "Wir sind Euch und dem Ruf des Atlas gefolgt, Kind. Steht an unserer Seite! Haus Orsellio wird Tisiphones Vermächtnis nicht gegen die falschen Ideale blinder Narren eintauschen!"
languages.original_text: "We followed the Atlas's call in your wake, Child. Stand with us! House Orsellio will not trade Tisiphone's legacy for the false ideals of blind fools!"

traits.locale_text: "Wir sind Euch und dem Ruf des Atlas gefolgt, Kind. Steht an unserer Seite! Haus Orsellio wird Tisiphones Vermächtnis nicht gegen die falschen Ideale blinder Narren eintauschen!"

languages.text: «Hemos seguido tus pasos respondiendo a la llamada del Atlas, niña. ¡Únete a nosotros! ¡La casa Orsellio no cambiará el legado de Tisiphone por los falsos ideales de unos necios ciegos!».
languages.original_text: "We followed the Atlas's call in your wake, Child. Stand with us! House Orsellio will not trade Tisiphone's legacy for the false ideals of blind fools!"

traits.locale_text: «Hemos seguido tus pasos respondiendo a la llamada del Atlas, niña. ¡Únete a nosotros! ¡La casa Orsellio no cambiará el legado de Tisiphone por los falsos ideales de unos necios ciegos!».

languages.text: "Atlas'ın çağrısını takip edip peşinden geldik Çocuk. Yanımızda dimdik dur! Orsellio Hanesi, kör ahmakların yalandan ülküleri uğruna Tisiphone'nin mirasından vazgeçmeyecek!"
languages.original_text: "We followed the Atlas's call in your wake, Child. Stand with us! House Orsellio will not trade Tisiphone's legacy for the false ideals of blind fools!"

traits.locale_text: "Peşinizden Atlas'ın çağrısını takip ettik Çocuk. Yanımızda dimdik durun! Orsellio Hanesi, kör aptalların yalancıktan ülküleri uğruna Tisiphone'nin mirasından vazgeçmeyecek!"
